version_description: Fixed bug with backing tracks playback
Optimized for iPhone X
We removed some known issues to provide a better user experience
We removed some known issues to provide a better user experience
We removed some known issues to provide a better user experience
Thank you for using our app! We prepared the update in which fixed some bugs to improve the user experience.

We really appreciate all your feedbacks and to make them better we made some changes:
• We have found and fixed some bugs of previous versions
• We have improved the stability and performance

In this new version we:
• added cloud storages - Dropbox, Google Drive, One Drive. Now you can add your own music and sing to it!
• fixed commonly reported bugs;
• made general improvements to make your experience better.
We love your feedback so keep it coming!

We are pleased to announce that in the new version of the app there are:
much less errors;
much more convenient and user-friendly interface;
improved stability.

Do you like bugs? We don’t like them, too. Therefore, we constantly struggle with them, and now you can evaluate the result. We’re also struggling with an inconvenient interface and everything that can interfere with your work while using our app. This update was able to eliminate all known issues.
Leave us feedback, we will be happy to hear your opinion!

We are pleased to announce that in the new version of the app there are:
much less errors;
much more convenient and user-friendly interface;
improved stability.

The app has become more efficient and easier to use:
- Improvement of frequency matching
- Adjustment of sound quality
- Correction of general sound parameters

We’re looking forward to your feedback and creative suggestions!

We did a great job to release this update. Now it will be easier and more pleasant for you to work with our app!
- We fixed bugs that didn’t allow you to work properly with the app;
- We made minor changes to improve the app stability.

The new version offers:
- Sound quality improvement
- Volume adjustments
- Interface optimization

We’ll be glad to receive your feedback and suggestions!

In this new version we have:
• fixed commonly reported bugs
• made general improvements to make your experience better
We love your feedback so keep it coming!

We really appreciate all your feedbacks and to make them better we made some changes:
• We have found and fixed some bugs of previous versions
• We have improved the stability and performance

The app has become more efficient and easier to use:
- Improvement of frequency matching
- Adjustment of sound quality
- Correction of general sound parameters

We’re looking forward to your feedback and creative suggestions!

Thanks to the feedback we received, we were able to improve our application.
In the new version you will find:
- even more intuitive and easy-to-use interface;
- no critical and minor bugs.

This update
• Includes bug fixes and feature enhancements.
• Fixes several stability issues.
Thanks to everyone for your support! It really helps us out!

We do not sit still, we continue to delight our users with updates.
This time we fixed all known issues and improved the stability of the application.
If something went wrong, then, please, let us know. We do appreciate your feedback.

We’ve updated the app! In the new version:
- tutorial added;
- possibility to save and share records added;
- much less bugs;
- minor changes in the interface;
- some general improvements.
Your opinion is important to us! Please, leave your feedback - we will gladly consider all your wishes and suggestions.

Thanks to the feedback we received, we were able to improve our application. In the new version you will find:
- even more intuitive and easy-to-use interface;
- no critical and minor bugs.

We love Halloween and we’ve prepared a terribly interesting update with a pleasant surprise!

We are pleased to announce that in the new version of the app there are:
- several microphone types - choose the one that will be able to unleash the full potential of your vocal;
- much less errors;
- much more convenient and user-friendly interface;
- improved stability.

In the new version: minor changes in the interface, less bugs and some general improvements.
Your opinion is important to us! Please, leave your feedback - we will gladly consider all your wishes and suggestions.

- speech to text using Artificial Intelligence !
- less bugs;
- minor changes in the interface.
Your opinion is important to us! Please, leave your feedback - we will gladly consider all your wishes and suggestions.

- No critical and minor bugs.
